list_of_reviews.review_title: I have same problem as everyone
list_of_reviews.review: I have same problem as everyone, they stopped withdrawals for me because I deposited and immediately withdrawed funds. It’s not a very big sum, 500 dollars, but still, they asked me to provide huge pack of documents, screenshots, etc. So I did, 6 weeks passed since then. The support stopped responding to my emails a month ago. Looks like think goes bad for them, if they scam people in so dumb way. I’m glad that I didn’t make a larger deposit. Do not trust them, all good reviews are written by their marketing team. I wish I had read the reviews, before I used that scam exchange.

They blocked me for withdrawals and requested documents that I provided 2 days after they accused me of being a US person which I am not but I currently study in the USA. They are trying to steal so badly. I have provided my citizenship which is not the USA. I will keep updating.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have had several issues as an amateur…
list_of_reviews.review: I have had several issues as an amateur not knowing my way around yet, and every time I opened Support chat someone came INSTANTLY to help out and was very friendly, patient and very professional. Knew immediately what was going on and what I had to do! Awesome Customer Support! Definitely one of the very best I've ever needed! Congratulations!  Roberto C.

i wait now 3 month to withdrawl my money... verification team dont answer since 2 week Although all sorts of available documents are available and more is constantly being demanded... It was an absolute impudence, in the past there were no problems at all... I am supposed to provide evidence from 2013-2015, which is impossible. I have a basic+ verification and should supposedly be able to pay out, but after about 20x trys I gave up. I hope there will be a class action lawsuit at some point. I don't believe I'll get my money back anymore. It's an impudence like I've never experienced on a crypto exchange. SCAM ALERT!!!!!!!

Got this basic scam message straight from their own verified support email. Beware of this company. "Please note that ETP was delisted and withdrawals closed, our only available option is to recover the tokens.As stated here, if you have not withdrawn the funds before the date and time specified, Bitfinex team can attempt to recover your funds.A fee of $500 on full or partial recovered funds will be applied. The fee will be deducted from your Exchange wallet after which, the recovery process will begin. If you would like us to proceed with the recovery, please make sure you have enough funds available for fee deduction."

I contacted two other helpers and it took me an hour and half but I didn't get answer. However Jonas answered me and found right solution. Others didn't find why red dot under AMOUNT XRP of order form in Trading tab. Jonas is the best!

Just great to have their support in complicated market conditions so we are trading successfully throughout! Various teams worked quickly and efficiently throughout while explaining plainly. If you are a trader you are able to concentrate on your trades knowing that processes needing to happen do so without you having to worry about them.

Registered fast, good app and security measures, until tried to Verify.Several attempts and nothing: passport and selfies never good enough. Worrying fact, that all images which are not good, still kept by Bitfinex on your account.Deactivated account after a few month, as wasted enough time with no results.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't waste your time and money
list_of_reviews.review: Don't waste your time and money, among all other platforms I have used so far Bitfinex is the worst, with very high deposit, withdrawal and trading fee. I transfered $MATIC coin from Binance and never received it, contacted support teams and it has been under review for ages. It seems never resolving. If you still join Bitfinex trust me it is going to be worst one you will come across. I should have checked the reviews before dealing with Bitfinex

They suddenly delist cryptos and don't even give people a chance to trade them to something they can take out of their Bitfinex wallet. Customer service is not very helpful either. I'd say stay away, there's already enough risk associated with Cryptocurrecy, you wouldn't want added risk because of Bitfinex. The user interface is also far inferior to their counterparts such as Coinbase and Ndax.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Promptly providing the proof of balance
list_of_reviews.review: Thank you very much for promptly providing the proof of balance. I also appreciate your helpful tips on using the Bitfinex reporting application. I find Bitfinex's services to be very thoughtful, and it instills a great deal of trust. Thank you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I can see that i am not the only one…
list_of_reviews.review: I can see that i am not the only one having issue getting back an account. Also i don't where did they find the support but never, never experienced such a disrespectful "support" saying that i am a liar. Few years ago i helped to creat an account to mother. No issue paying them money but few months ago after she wanted to learn something for her old days its just impossible because she coudnlt send her selfie with handwrited justification with a high resolution(but clear and visible) also i had to translator everything because she's older French lady and don't speek english. This is just crazy, they pretend to be a great exchange blablabla but the support is simply rude, the rules just changed not even giving a chance to adapt. Really can't recommend. Just stick to your ledger guya

Reading the recent reviews makes me wonder who's paying people to shill on Bitfinex. They are spreading lies, and while Bitfinex has it's own share of problems, none of them are the ones that these goofies are refering. If you're going to leave a negative review, atleast make it look plausibly credible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I see a potential in this exchange, but slow verification process
list_of_reviews.review: I see a potential in this exchange, and very good reviews in other websites, so I did the signup process and started the verification stage (uploaded all documentation) but has been 8 weeks, two months and no notice at all.It could be faster, I think.EDIT: soon after this post, the good people at Bitfinex checked the case and did the proper steps to get the account verified quickly. Thanks.

list_of_reviews.review_title: After 6 years of service they hold my funds
list_of_reviews.review: After 6 years of service (I have used the exchange occasionally) they hold my funds for 3 weeks. I have provided All information I could. The verification Team does not reply for one week. If they allow me to withdraw, I will update this reviews

Amazing experience with Bitfinex's Customer Service. Last year I got my account hacked, I emailed Bitfinex on a Saturday evening, they blocked my account and suspended all pending trades within 3 minutes (this way, the hacker couldn't withdraw all my coins). Today I emailed them about an issue with my 2FA, they replied in 2 minutes. They are doing a great job, I really feel taken care of!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for…
list_of_reviews.review: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for 1.5 years. It's a fishy exchange with heavily manipulated prices and withdrawal was impossible. And more and more traders felt Bitfinex actually trade against you. It means you will lose money for sure. Stay away! Try any other exchanges but Bitfinex

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've…
list_of_reviews.review: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've ever used with all their new updates since last year there is no change of getting hacked at all, they have been providing their users with the best assets to trade at the lowest fees.. Their support is now outstanding you have a problem it's fixed in a few hours honestly I'm amazed at how good this exchange has become!

My LN-BTC withdrawal failed, and had a confusing error message. I emailed the support, and they VERY quickly responded and informed me why it was happening, and what was going to happen next. Pretty shortly thereafter, the amount was returned to my wallet. Great customer service! Most importantly, they were fast and helpful.I was able to complete withdrawal after a couple more failed attempts (all my fault being a lightning newb), and each time they patiently returned the money to me.

Thieves! After you set up your account they allow you to deposit and trade, but when you try to withdraw they block you and hold your funds claiming that you have not completed account verification, but my profile states my account verification all sections are completed.When you send emails to support they do not reply. The result they hold your funds.
An agent called Max provided a very professional answers to my issues in a quick and precise manner. Not even mention the passion that Max had shown me. Luck platform to have Max served inside.

The support stopped responding to my emails a month ago. Looks like think goes bad for them, if they scam people in so dumb way. I’m glad that I didn’t make a larger deposit. Do not trust them, all good reviews are written by their marketing team. I wish I had read the reviews, before I used that scam exchange.

prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight successful trading and quick withdrawals, while negative reviews focus on account closures, poor customer service, and technical issues. Key differentiators are service reliability and customer support quality.

prompts_output.Output: I don't have specific information on Bitfinex.com's customer support interactions, as the context provided only pertains to Coinbase. Therefore, I cannot gauge the effectiveness or responsiveness of the Bitfinex.com support team.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Based on the review sentiments and contents, predict potential future issues www.bitfinex.com might face or areas where they could improve. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Bitfinex might face issues with customer trust and regulatory compliance if they don't address customer service quality, clarify account suspension protocols, and ensure timely resolution of disputes. Improving transparency and support responsiveness is essential to maintain user satisfaction and avoid potential legal challenges.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify any outliers or unusual reviews that deviate significantly from the general consensus, which might warrant further investigation. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to specific reviews beyond the provided context, so I cannot identify outliers or unusual reviews. The general consensus suggests caution due to mixed experiences, but without more data, pinpointing deviations is not possible.

overall_prompt_summary: Based on the context provided, the company in question has received mixed feedback from its customers. Key themes from the reviews suggest that there are concerns regarding untrustworthy practices and poor customer service, which are significant issues that the company needs to address. While some customers have reported satisfactory experiences, the negative reviews highlight a need for the company to improve its reliability and customer support. The mixed nature of the reviews indicates that while the company may be capable of successful transactions, there is a level of inconsistency that could be damaging to its reputation. Potential areas for improvement include enhancing transparency, strengthening customer service protocols, and conducting further investigation into the specific causes of customer dissatisfaction to implement targeted solutions.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Shady and can be scam freezing 900000$
list_of_reviews.review: Just stay away, after 5 years of service, suddenly they came up with a story of KYC, and started asking questions about origin of everything and of course answered while it was really hard for me to remember and get these info.After answering everything they are trying to delay and waste my time with some old TX's that was deposited 2022/2023 all of them sum is less than 8000$ while my account has more than 900,000$ worth of crypto!I don't know what to do as I can't remember and find all of these 6 tx's and I want to be clear with them.when I searched these addresses I didn't find problems about them at all. Then why they asking about them while it's even a very small amount of money? is it a scam or a time waste or what exactly!
An agent called Max provided a very professional answers to my issues in a quick and precise manner. Not even mention the passion that Max had shown me. Luck platform to have Max served inside.

Do not trust them, all good reviews are written by their marketing team. I wish I had read the reviews, before I used that scam exchange.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.bitfinex.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews indicate that Bitfinex's customer support is highly responsive and effective, resolving issues quickly, even outside of regular business hours, and providing a sense of security to users.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews primarily highlight advancements in technology, particularly the integration of AI and NFTs, indicating a strong interest in the intersection of cutting-edge tech with the digital asset space. Market growth is another focal point, with discussions on staking and updates on various ecosystem developments suggesting that users are keen on understanding and participating in the expansion of the market. Community news, including project introductions and strategies for resilience, reflects an engaged and proactive community that values innovation and collaboration. However, there is a noticeable absence of dialogue on regulatory governance, which could be a critical oversight given the importance of legal and regulatory compliance in the sustainability of the market. Finally, the reviews suggest that investors are looking for diversified portfolios and long-term value, with a preference for actionable information that can lead to immediate liquidity and informed decision-making, pointing to a need for more data-driven insights and market analysis in future discussions.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Shady and can be scam freezing 900000$
list_of_reviews.review: Just stay away, after 5 years of service, suddenly they came up with a story of KYC, and started asking questions about origin of everything and of course answered while it was really hard for me to remember and get these info.After answering everything they are trying to delay and waste my time with some old TX's that was deposited 2022/2023 all of them sum is less than 8000$ while my account has more than 900,000$ worth of crypto!I don't know what to do as I can't remember and find all of these 6 tx's and I want to be clear with them.when I searched these addresses I didn't find problems about them at all. Then why they asking about them while it's even a very small amount of money? is it a scam or a time waste or what exactly!
An agent called Max provided a very professional answers to my issues in a quick and precise manner. Not even mention the passion that Max had shown me. Luck platform to have Max served inside.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have same problem as everyone
list_of_reviews.review: I have same problem as everyone, they stopped withdrawals for me because I deposited and immediately withdrawed funds. It’s not a very big sum, 500 dollars, but still, they asked me to provide huge pack of documents, screenshots, etc. So I did, 6 weeks passed since then. The support stopped responding to my emails a month ago. Looks like think goes bad for them, if they scam people in so dumb way. I’m glad that I didn’t make a larger deposit. Do not trust them, all good reviews are written by their marketing team. I wish I had read the reviews, before I used that scam exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have had several issues as an amateur…
list_of_reviews.review: I have had several issues as an amateur not knowing my way around yet, and every time I opened Support chat someone came INSTANTLY to help out and was very friendly, patient and very professional. Knew immediately what was going on and what I had to do! Awesome Customer Support! Definitely one of the very best I've ever needed! Congratulations!  Roberto C.

They blocked me for withdrawals and requested documents that I provided 2 days after they accused me of being a US person which I am not but I currently study in the USA. They are trying to steal so badly. I have provided my citizenship which is not the USA. I will keep updating.

i wait now 3 month to withdrawl my money... verification team dont answer since 2 week Although all sorts of available documents are available and more is constantly being demanded... It was an absolute impudence, in the past there were no problems at all... I am supposed to provide evidence from 2013-2015, which is impossible. I have a basic+ verification and should supposedly be able to pay out, but after about 20x trys I gave up. I hope there will be a class action lawsuit at some point. I don't believe I'll get my money back anymore. It's an impudence like I've never experienced on a crypto exchange. SCAM ALERT!!!!!!!

Got this basic scam message straight from their own verified support email. Beware of this company. "Please note that ETP was delisted and withdrawals closed, our only available option is to recover the tokens.As stated here, if you have not withdrawn the funds before the date and time specified, Bitfinex team can attempt to recover your funds.A fee of $500 on full or partial recovered funds will be applied. The fee will be deducted from your Exchange wallet after which, the recovery process will begin. If you would like us to proceed with the recovery, please make sure you have enough funds available for fee deduction."

I contacted two other helpers and it took me an hour and half but I didn't get answer. However Jonas answered me and found right solution. Others didn't find why red dot under AMOUNT XRP of order form in Trading tab. Jonas is the best!

Just great to have their support in complicated market conditions so we are trading successfully throughout! Various teams worked quickly and efficiently throughout while explaining plainly. If you are a trader you are able to concentrate on your trades knowing that processes needing to happen do so without you having to worry about them.

Registered fast, good app and security measures, until tried to Verify.Several attempts and nothing: passport and selfies never good enough. Worrying fact, that all images which are not good, still kept by Bitfinex on your account.Deactivated account after a few month, as wasted enough time with no results.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't waste your time and money
list_of_reviews.review: Don't waste your time and money, among all other platforms I have used so far Bitfinex is the worst, with very high deposit, withdrawal and trading fee. I transfered $MATIC coin from Binance and never received it, contacted support teams and it has been under review for ages. It seems never resolving. If you still join Bitfinex trust me it is going to be worst one you will come across. I should have checked the reviews before dealing with Bitfinex

They suddenly delist cryptos and don't even give people a chance to trade them to something they can take out of their Bitfinex wallet. Customer service is not very helpful either. I'd say stay away, there's already enough risk associated with Cryptocurrecy, you wouldn't want added risk because of Bitfinex. The user interface is also far inferior to their counterparts such as Coinbase and Ndax.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I can see that i am not the only one…
list_of_reviews.review: I can see that i am not the only one having issue getting back an account. Also i don't where did they find the support but never, never experienced such a disrespectful "support" saying that i am a liar. Few years ago i helped to creat an account to mother. No issue paying them money but few months ago after she wanted to learn something for her old days its just impossible because she coudnlt send her selfie with handwrited justification with a high resolution(but clear and visible) also i had to translator everything because she's older French lady and don't speek english. This is just crazy, they pretend to be a great exchange blablabla but the support is simply rude, the rules just changed not even giving a chance to adapt. Really can't recommend. Just stick to your ledger guya

Reading the recent reviews makes me wonder who's paying people to shill on Bitfinex. They are spreading lies, and while Bitfinex has it's own share of problems, none of them are the ones that these goofies are refering. If you're going to leave a negative review, atleast make it look plausibly credible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Promptly providing the proof of balance
list_of_reviews.review: Thank you very much for promptly providing the proof of balance. I also appreciate your helpful tips on using the Bitfinex reporting application. I find Bitfinex's services to be very thoughtful, and it instills a great deal of trust. Thank you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I see a potential in this exchange, but slow verification process
list_of_reviews.review: I see a potential in this exchange, and very good reviews in other websites, so I did the signup process and started the verification stage (uploaded all documentation) but has been 8 weeks, two months and no notice at all.It could be faster, I think.EDIT: soon after this post, the good people at Bitfinex checked the case and did the proper steps to get the account verified quickly. Thanks.

Amazing experience with Bitfinex's Customer Service. Last year I got my account hacked, I emailed Bitfinex on a Saturday evening, they blocked my account and suspended all pending trades within 3 minutes (this way, the hacker couldn't withdraw all my coins). Today I emailed them about an issue with my 2FA, they replied in 2 minutes. They are doing a great job, I really feel taken care of!

list_of_reviews.review_title: After 6 years of service they hold my funds
list_of_reviews.review: After 6 years of service (I have used the exchange occasionally) they hold my funds for 3 weeks. I have provided All information I could. The verification Team does not reply for one week. If they allow me to withdraw, I will update this reviews

list_of_reviews.review_title: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for…
list_of_reviews.review: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for 1.5 years. It's a fishy exchange with heavily manipulated prices and withdrawal was impossible. And more and more traders felt Bitfinex actually trade against you. It means you will lose money for sure. Stay away! Try any other exchanges but Bitfinex

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've…
list_of_reviews.review: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've ever used with all their new updates since last year there is no change of getting hacked at all, they have been providing their users with the best assets to trade at the lowest fees.. Their support is now outstanding you have a problem it's fixed in a few hours honestly I'm amazed at how good this exchange has become!

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.bitfinex.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common praise: "robustness," "security," "speed," "expeditious support," "quick deposit and withdrawal," "real market prices," "easy to use," "proof of balance," "helpful tips," "trust." Concerns: "high commissions," "language barrier," "lack of some POW crypto," "slow verification process." These indicate satisfaction with performance and trustworthiness but issues with fees, language, and verification speed.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 2.67, indicating mixed satisfaction. The distribution shows one positive and two negative reviews, suggesting varied user experiences with the platform.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Users report mixed experiences with the platform: some appreciate its ease of use and efficient fund recovery, while others struggle with complexity, poor customer support, and security concerns. Satisfaction seems to depend on technical skill and expectations for support. Average rating: 2.67.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews often commend ease of use, efficient fund recovery, and low fees, while negative reviews frequently mention complexity, poor customer support, and security issues, suggesting that user satisfaction hinges on technical skill and support expectations.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.bitfinex.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews indicate that Bitfinex's customer support is generally effective and responsive, with instances of quick action during emergencies and helpful assistance with account issues, although there is a mention of a slow verification process that was resolved after the user reached out.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews highlight a cryptocurrency ecosystem that is rapidly evolving, with a strong emphasis on technological advancements such as staking, integrations, and the development of an Alliance module. Governance is a critical issue, with discussions centered on how the ecosystem is managed and how decisions are made. Market growth is evident through mentions of new partnerships and active community engagement, suggesting a healthy interest in the expansion of the market. Community interaction is also a focal point, with project spotlights and investor interests indicating a vibrant and participatory user base. Potential areas for improvement or further investigation could include enhancing the transparency and effectiveness of governance processes, ensuring technological updates meet user needs, and maintaining the momentum of market growth through strategic partnerships and community initiatives.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.bitfinex.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I'm sorry, but I don't have the capability to analyze specific reviews for content or to extract key phrases or words from them. My functionality is limited to providing general information based on available knowledge up to my last update.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I'm sorry, but I don't have the capability to analyze specific reviews, their dates, ratings, titles, or content. Therefore, I cannot calculate the average rating from reviews or analyze the distribution of ratings.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I'm sorry, but I don't have the capability to analyze specific reviews or their content to generate summaries. My functionality is limited to providing general information on topics.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I'm sorry, but I don't have the capability to analyze specific reviews or their content, including their date, rating, title, or the topics mentioned. Therefore, I cannot provide a contrast between the topics in positive and negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.bitfinex.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have the capability to analyze specific reviews or their content, including mentions of customer support interactions, to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the Bitfinex support team.

overall_prompt_summary: I'm sorry, but I don't have the capability to analyze specific posts for content or categorization. My functionality is limited to providing general information on the topic of cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. If you have questions about these broader topics or need general advice on cryptocurrency trends, I can certainly help with that. However, for detailed analysis of review titles and contents, you might need to use specialized data analysis tools or services that can process and summarize textual information.

prompts_output.Output: Key phrases and words include "shills," "proof of balance," "slow verification process," "customer support," "manipulated prices," "withdrawal issues," and "account verified quickly." These suggest concerns with credibility, transparency, efficiency, and fairness, alongside praise for responsiveness and support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 3, indicating mixed satisfaction. The polarized distribution with two high and two low ratings suggests users have varied experiences with the app's features and support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Users appreciate the app's security and user-friendliness but are frustrated by poor customer support and account management issues, leading to a polarized average rating of 3 out of 5.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews commend security and usability, while negative reviews lament inadequate customer support, account issues, and unmet expectations from support services. Key differentiators are effective support and platform reliability during critical usage.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.bitfinex.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews indicate that Bitfinex's customer support is generally effective and responsive, with instances of quick action during emergencies and prompt replies to inquiries, despite some reports of slow verification processes.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews indicate a polarized user sentiment towards the app, with an average rating of 3 out of 5, reflecting a balance of satisfaction and dissatisfaction among users. Positive feedback praises the app for its strong security features and ease of use, suggesting that the app is reliable and user-friendly in these aspects. However, critical issues are raised regarding customer support, with users feeling that the support team requires additional training and that there are instances of accounts being locked without clear explanations. Complaints about "empty promises from support" highlight a need for the app's customer service to improve its responsiveness and follow-through on issues. To enhance overall user satisfaction, the app's developers should focus on strengthening customer support, ensuring transparent communication, and addressing account management concerns.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Shady and can be scam freezing 900000$
list_of_reviews.review: Just stay away, after 5 years of service, suddenly they came up with a story of KYC, and started asking questions about origin of everything and of course answered while it was really hard for me to remember and get these info.After answering everything they are trying to delay and waste my time with some old TX's that was deposited 2022/2023 all of them sum is less than 8000$ while my account has more than 900,000$ worth of crypto!I don't know what to do as I can't remember and find all of these 6 tx's and I want to be clear with them.when I searched these addresses I didn't find problems about them at all. Then why they asking about them while it's even a very small amount of money? is it a scam or a time waste or what exactly!
An agent called Max provided a very professional answers to my issues in a quick and precise manner. Not even mention the passion that Max had shown me. Luck platform to have Max served inside.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have same problem as everyone
list_of_reviews.review: I have same problem as everyone, they stopped withdrawals for me because I deposited and immediately withdrawed funds. It’s not a very big sum, 500 dollars, but still, they asked me to provide huge pack of documents, screenshots, etc. So I did, 6 weeks passed since then. The support stopped responding to my emails a month ago. Looks like think goes bad for them, if they scam people in so dumb way. I’m glad that I didn’t make a larger deposit. Do not trust them, all good reviews are written by their marketing team. I wish I had read the reviews, before I used that scam exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have had several issues as an amateur…
list_of_reviews.review: I have had several issues as an amateur not knowing my way around yet, and every time I opened Support chat someone came INSTANTLY to help out and was very friendly, patient and very professional. Knew immediately what was going on and what I had to do! Awesome Customer Support! Definitely one of the very best I've ever needed! Congratulations!  Roberto C.

They blocked me for withdrawals and requested documents that I provided 2 days after they accused me of being a US person which I am not but I currently study in the USA. They are trying to steal so badly. I have provided my citizenship which is not the USA. I will keep updating.

i wait now 3 month to withdrawl my money... verification team dont answer since 2 week Although all sorts of available documents are available and more is constantly being demanded... It was an absolute impudence, in the past there were no problems at all... I am supposed to provide evidence from 2013-2015, which is impossible. I have a basic+ verification and should supposedly be able to pay out, but after about 20x trys I gave up. I hope there will be a class action lawsuit at some point. I don't believe I'll get my money back anymore. It's an impudence like I've never experienced on a crypto exchange. SCAM ALERT!!!!!!!

Got this basic scam message straight from their own verified support email. Beware of this company. "Please note that ETP was delisted and withdrawals closed, our only available option is to recover the tokens.As stated here, if you have not withdrawn the funds before the date and time specified, Bitfinex team can attempt to recover your funds.A fee of $500 on full or partial recovered funds will be applied. The fee will be deducted from your Exchange wallet after which, the recovery process will begin. If you would like us to proceed with the recovery, please make sure you have enough funds available for fee deduction."

I contacted two other helpers and it took me an hour and half but I didn't get answer. However Jonas answered me and found right solution. Others didn't find why red dot under AMOUNT XRP of order form in Trading tab. Jonas is the best!

Just great to have their support in complicated market conditions so we are trading successfully throughout! Various teams worked quickly and efficiently throughout while explaining plainly. If you are a trader you are able to concentrate on your trades knowing that processes needing to happen do so without you having to worry about them.

Registered fast, good app and security measures, until tried to Verify.Several attempts and nothing: passport and selfies never good enough. Worrying fact, that all images which are not good, still kept by Bitfinex on your account.Deactivated account after a few month, as wasted enough time with no results.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't waste your time and money
list_of_reviews.review: Don't waste your time and money, among all other platforms I have used so far Bitfinex is the worst, with very high deposit, withdrawal and trading fee. I transfered $MATIC coin from Binance and never received it, contacted support teams and it has been under review for ages. It seems never resolving. If you still join Bitfinex trust me it is going to be worst one you will come across. I should have checked the reviews before dealing with Bitfinex

They suddenly delist cryptos and don't even give people a chance to trade them to something they can take out of their Bitfinex wallet. Customer service is not very helpful either. I'd say stay away, there's already enough risk associated with Cryptocurrecy, you wouldn't want added risk because of Bitfinex. The user interface is also far inferior to their counterparts such as Coinbase and Ndax.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I can see that i am not the only one…
list_of_reviews.review: I can see that i am not the only one having issue getting back an account. Also i don't where did they find the support but never, never experienced such a disrespectful "support" saying that i am a liar. Few years ago i helped to creat an account to mother. No issue paying them money but few months ago after she wanted to learn something for her old days its just impossible because she coudnlt send her selfie with handwrited justification with a high resolution(but clear and visible) also i had to translator everything because she's older French lady and don't speek english. This is just crazy, they pretend to be a great exchange blablabla but the support is simply rude, the rules just changed not even giving a chance to adapt. Really can't recommend. Just stick to your ledger guya

Reading the recent reviews makes me wonder who's paying people to shill on Bitfinex. They are spreading lies, and while Bitfinex has it's own share of problems, none of them are the ones that these goofies are refering. If you're going to leave a negative review, atleast make it look plausibly credible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Promptly providing the proof of balance
list_of_reviews.review: Thank you very much for promptly providing the proof of balance. I also appreciate your helpful tips on using the Bitfinex reporting application. I find Bitfinex's services to be very thoughtful, and it instills a great deal of trust. Thank you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I see a potential in this exchange, but slow verification process
list_of_reviews.review: I see a potential in this exchange, and very good reviews in other websites, so I did the signup process and started the verification stage (uploaded all documentation) but has been 8 weeks, two months and no notice at all.It could be faster, I think.EDIT: soon after this post, the good people at Bitfinex checked the case and did the proper steps to get the account verified quickly. Thanks.

Amazing experience with Bitfinex's Customer Service. Last year I got my account hacked, I emailed Bitfinex on a Saturday evening, they blocked my account and suspended all pending trades within 3 minutes (this way, the hacker couldn't withdraw all my coins). Today I emailed them about an issue with my 2FA, they replied in 2 minutes. They are doing a great job, I really feel taken care of!

list_of_reviews.review_title: After 6 years of service they hold my funds
list_of_reviews.review: After 6 years of service (I have used the exchange occasionally) they hold my funds for 3 weeks. I have provided All information I could. The verification Team does not reply for one week. If they allow me to withdraw, I will update this reviews

list_of_reviews.review_title: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for…
list_of_reviews.review: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for 1.5 years. It's a fishy exchange with heavily manipulated prices and withdrawal was impossible. And more and more traders felt Bitfinex actually trade against you. It means you will lose money for sure. Stay away! Try any other exchanges but Bitfinex

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've…
list_of_reviews.review: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've ever used with all their new updates since last year there is no change of getting hacked at all, they have been providing their users with the best assets to trade at the lowest fees.. Their support is now outstanding you have a problem it's fixed in a few hours honestly I'm amazed at how good this exchange has become!

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.bitfinex.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common concerns: "account access issues," "poor interface performance," "inadequate customer support," "slow verification process." Praise includes: "security, robustness," "fluidity," "prompt proof of balance," "helpful tips," "trust." These indicate user experience trends regarding Bitfinex's performance and service quality.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 2.2, reflecting general dissatisfaction. Most reviews are negative, with prevalent issues like account access and poor customer support, indicating a majority of users are unhappy with the service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Users are largely dissatisfied, citing account access problems, poor interface, and weak customer support. Despite some praise for security and ease of use, the low average rating of 2.2 reflects the predominance of negative experiences with the service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight the app's security and ease of use, while negative reviews focus on account access issues, poor interface performance, and inadequate customer support, indicating that user experiences vary based on personal outcomes and perceptions of the app's functionality and service quality.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.bitfinex.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews suggest Bitfinex's customer support is highly responsive and effective, resolving issues quickly, even outside of typical business hours, and providing helpful assistance, which enhances user trust in the platform.

overall_prompt_summary: The key findings from the reviews indicate that while users appreciate the app's security and ease of use, there are significant issues with account access, interface performance, and customer support. The positive feedback often centers around successful transactions and the reliability of the platform, suggesting that when the app functions as intended, users find it satisfactory. However, the prevalence of negative reviews, with an average rating of 2.2, points to widespread user dissatisfaction, particularly due to technical problems and poor customer service experiences. Critical issues such as account access barriers and subpar interface performance are major sources of frustration for users, overshadowing the app's positive aspects. For improvement, the app developers should prioritize enhancing the user interface, streamlining account access processes, and bolstering customer support to address the concerns and potentially improve overall user satisfaction.
